points.title: You have
points.pointsText:
Ocean Points is a flexible rewards program designed to thank our loyal guests.

💡 How It Works: 
📲 Scan a QR code during each visit to collect points.
🍽️ Earn points for dining in, takeout, or online orders.
🎯 Exchange your points for delicious rewards like free dishes or discounts.

🐚 Example Rewards:

100 points ‚Üí Free dessert
200 points ‚Üí Free appetizer
300 points ‚Üí 20% off your bill
500 points ‚Üí Free main course

‚è±️ QR codes are single-use and refreshed daily to prevent reuse
points.qr: Show this QR-code to the waiter  to earn Ocean Points or get your reward
